overview:
Richard Wimmer has practiced law since 2000. He worked as an attorney at Fellner Wratzfeld & Partner, a major Austrian law firm before joining IBM in 2006 as an in-house counsel.

Richard has handled numerous litigation cases and has worked on many complex legal transactions in the private and public sector. With his unique background, Richard has gained extensive knowledge both about law and the IT industry.

Richard earned a degree in International Relations at the Johns Hopkins University, Bologna Center, and holds a Law Degree from the University of Vienna and a Masters Degree in Law and Economics.
